animeDescription: The series will explore an alternate universe to the main series, and will focus on Kouji Ibuki, an antagonist in the Cardfight!! Vanguard Movie: Neon Messiah, and Suiko Tatsunagi.  (Source: ANN, edited)
animeCharacters: ['Ibuki, Kouji', 'Sendou, Emi', 'Shuka', 'Sendou, Aichi', 'Suzugamori, Ren', 'Morikawa, Katsumi', 'Tatsunagi, Rekka', 'Tatsunagi, Suiko']
